document.full_text: goldman sachs group inc  has moved closer to offloading litton loan servicing, with ocwen financial corp  leading in an auction to acquire the troubled mortgage business, sources familiar with the situation said this week.
document.title: ocwen in lead to buy goldman's litton: sources
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs group inc  has moved closer to offloading litton loan servicing, with ocwen financial corp  leading in an auction to acquire the troubled mortgage business, sources familiar with the situation said this week.
